about_the_game:
Chaos Chain

The Founder Pack DLC is for people who'd like to show their ultimate support for Chaos Chain and Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow and do what we do while also giving you an edge in the game by rewarding your character with some extra starting gear to give them a head start into their adventure. These items are rewarded as a "thank you" to owners of The Founder Pack DLC. Thank you to everyone who purchases this for your ultimate support and contribution. You've truly gone completely above and beyond!

Exclusives:
  • 1x Lucky Trickster Pistol - A small and incredibly cheap, pocket-sized 10mm pistol. Has a much higher critical chance than its counterparts. Great for a last resort!
  • "Booster" and "Volunteer" - Two exclusive titles for your character to be known as that can be accessed through the PDA item in the inventory!
  • 4x Founder Skins - Four exclusive founder skins (two male and two female) that can be accessed at any wardrobe!
  • 1x Extra Skill Point - Knowledge goes a long way in the sprawl. Get ahead of the curve with 1 free skill point!
  • Cyber Dice - A special set of high tech dice. Enter the number of sides you want the dice to have and roll!
  • Chaos Chain Logo Desktop Backgrounds - Each available in 6 different resolutions including 800x600, 1920x1080, 1280x720, 1366x768, 1536x860, and 1440x900!

Extras:
  • 1x First Aid Kit - Patch yourself up after a bad run. This kit will heal some of the worst kinds of wounds!
  • 1x Energy Drink - Stay hydrated and fueled for whatever is thrown your way!
  • 1x Protein Bar - Hungry but on the go? Pack this protein bar in your bag and you'll still be able to eat tonight!
  • 2x Pain Pills - Fight off the pain of a hard day in Slade City with these little wonder pills!
  • 10x 10mm FMJ Bullets - These will work great in your Lucky Trickster Pistol!
  • 1x Duffel Bag - A huge pack to carry all of your equipment around in!
  • 1x Memory Chip - An extra memory chip which allows you to save the game anytime and anywhere you wish!
  • 50x Cred - Cred is the currency in Chaos Chain, needed for just about anything and everything!

PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE TWO WAYS TO ACTIVATE THIS DLC IN GAME. YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
---
  • 1 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *NEW* CHARACTER, JUST CREATE YOUR CHARACTER AND THE DLC WILL AUTOMATICALLY ACTIVATE AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!
  • 2 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *SAVED* CHARACTER, YOU MUST USE THE PDA ITEM IN YOUR INVENTORY AND SELECT "ACTIVATE DLC".
  • AFTER - THEY CAN THEN BE FOUND IN YOUR STORAGE STASH! YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH!

[/list]
